issue.title: [JS] Easy way to create a new Table with an additional column
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2764](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2764). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It should be easier to add a new column to a table. API could be either `table.addColumn(vector)` or `table.merge(..tables or vectors)`
